Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We hope by now you’ve had a chance to browse your partner portal and see the exciting new resources at your disposal.
Make sure to check out the Getting Started page <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/]]>, which has quick links to all of your portal activities:
- Have a client interested in BigCommerce? Let us know about the opportunity so you get paid. - Need to get trained? Learn more about the BigCommerce platform. - Want to celebrate your partnership? Tell the world that you're a BigCommerce Partner. - Looking for marketing resources? Use out tools to help you sell more. - Want to see your account? See the details of your partnership.
Get started now <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
Need assistance? Register for an onboarding webinar <[[https://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/]]>.
Thank you,
The BigCommerce Partner Team partnersupport@bigcommerce.com
